statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customers ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE total_purchases BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases, last_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, total_purchases, last_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE promotion_id < 5;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_details FROM promotions ORDER BY promotion_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_spent < 500 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, email, promotion_name FROM customers INNER JOIN promotions ON customers.customer_id = promotions.promotion_id
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers;
SELECT name, email FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT promo_name, start_date, discount FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, promo_id FROM customer_promotions JOIN promotions ON customer_promotions.promo_id = promotions.promo_id ORDER BY promo_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers;
SELECT name, total_purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT name, email, start_date, end_date FROM high_value_customers JOIN promotions ON total_purchase_amount > 500 AND name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT hvc.name AS customer_name, pr.promo_name AS promotion_name, pr.discount AS discount_percent FROM high_value_customers hvc JOIN customer_promotions cp ON hvc.customer_id = cp.customer_id JOIN promotions pr ON cp.promo_id = pr.promo_id WHERE pr.discount > 10;

SELECT hvc.name AS customer_name, hvc.total_purchase_amount, pr.promo_name AS promotion_name, pr.start_date AS promotion_start_date, pr.end_date AS promotion_end_date FROM high_value_customers hvc JOIN customer_promotions cp ON hvc.customer_id = cp.customer_id JOIN promotions pr ON cp.promo_id = pr.promo_id WHERE hvc.total_purchase_amount > 500 AND pr.discount < 15 ORDER BY hvc.total_purchase_amount DESC, pr.start_date;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE discount_rate > 0.1;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE discount_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY promotion_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description, promotion_start_date FROM promotions WHERE promotion_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT email_subject, email_content, email_sent_date FROM emails WHERE customer_id = 'e5b9b3f0-79bc-492b-ba5a-0cd95c72f4bf';
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, orders.order_total FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM promotions WHERE promotion_end_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT email_subject, email_content, email_sent_date FROM emails ORDER BY email_sent_date DESC;
